title: Ranked Champ Select Problem
body:
Occasionally when I play ranked on a specific computer the champ select 'freezes' for a period of time where I can't see who has picked/banned what and I am unable to pick should it come to my turn, however it tends to unfreeze after a small period of time.

In the last ranked game I played this happened and it caused me to not be able to pick a champion as it didn't unfreeze and so I lost 3 lp, which could actually cost me entrance into promos (78 lp as a result and getting 18-20 per win). It also displayed an error report twice during this time where it didn't unfreeze however it change what was happening.

I was wondering if anyone else has experienced this and if there is any way to fix this as I do not want to lose anymore lp to an error in the game.

replies.body: That sounds like what would happen if there was a drop in your internet during champ select. Do you get lag at all while playing games?
I do not lag while playing, my internet stays quite consistent. Also while this was happening I was in a skype call interrupted.

>Also while this was happening I was in a skype call interrupted.

That doesn't make sense. Did you mean that, while you were in a Skype call and in champion select at the same time, the call was also interrupted while the glitch occurred?

*New development

I won my next ranked game and I am now on 97 lp. The freeze caused me to lose 3 lp. I feel so cheated.
